review: While there are many things it does well (plex, neflix, amazon instant video) it's really frustrating that some apps are still getting listed as incompatible with the stick. Yes you can side load but it's not a good user experience.Why does Tune In radio (standard) show up as compatible while pros does not?Why are plex app updates delayed to what is available from plex themselves or the google play store.Why can I only purchase or send an app to a device from a desktop browser (ipad/iphone won't work). That said the app is likely also flagged as incompatible.I do like the device I worry that the some of it's limitations will limit the product's life. A great deal for the 19 bucks I paid but at 39 or 79-99 for the fire tv I would probably say hold off for something with better support/a more friendly "garden".
